skillTree.name: Grand Telekinesis
skillTree.description: Lord Kroak's power can level cities, but it can also help rebuild them.

effects.description:
Armour: +5 for all units when defending
	(local armies)

Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Baneful Gaze
skillTree.description: What lies behind the golden mask?

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: -25% for enemy armies starting their turn in this province
	(local enemy armies)

skillTree.name: Telepathic Guidance
skillTree.description: Though he does not speak, while in his presence the Lizardmen perform their duties with greater efficiency.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -25% for all units
	(local armies)

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(local armies)

skillTree.name: Kroak's Sanctuary
skillTree.description: His honour guard patrol tirelessly.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -10
	(local enemy armies)

Campaign line of sight: +50%
	(Heroes in local province)

skillTree.name: Elevated Minds
skillTree.description: Logic and order render fear inconsequential.

skillTree.name: True Restoration
skillTree.description: The winds flow and wounds mend.

skillTree.name: Imbued Ferocity
skillTree.description: With a snarl and a roar, those who serve near Kroak inspire their regiments to ferocious deeds.

skillTree.name: Itza's Defense
skillTree.description: Kroak's most potent memory, the final defense of Itza, can be felt and shared through the telepathic link.

skillTree.name: The Final Design
skillTree.description: The final stage of the Great Plan has begun.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +10% when under siege
	(all armies)

Construction cost: -100% for Landmark buildings
	(all regions)

Ability: "Will of Aeons" for Saurus units
	(all armies)

Replaces "To the End" for Saurus units
	(all armies)

skillTree.name: Connected to the Winds
skillTree.description: They flow through Kroak's withered form as though he were a conduit of power himself.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -5 for "Deliverance of Itza I"
Winds of Magic cost: -5 for "Deliverance of Itza II"
Winds of Magic cost: -5 for "Deliverance of Itza III"

skillTree.name: Ancient Wisdom
skillTree.description: The Slann have practiced magic far longer than any mortal.

skillTree.name: Geomantic Potency
skillTree.description: The Slann and Skink Priests are empowered by the Geomantic Web.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +5
	(all armies)

Winds of Magic power reserve: +10
	(all armies)

skillTree.name: Quickened Minds
skillTree.description: A Slann does not cast a spell early, nor does he cast it late. He casts it precisely when he means to.

skillTree.name: Power of the Sun
skillTree.description: Sapped from the enemy and turned to enchant and protect.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -10
	(local enemy armies)

skillTree.name: Secrets of the Winds
skillTree.description: Studied for millenia by the Slann, shared now for the furtherment of the Great Plan.

skillTree.name: Arcane Dominance
skillTree.description: Who but the Lizardmen can claim to be masters of magic?

effects.description:
Winds of Magic starting amount: +5
	(all armies)

Winds of Magic starting amount: +10
	(all armies)

skillTree.name: Perfected Technique
skillTree.description: With Kroak's guidance the Slann reach new heights of skill.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: -5% for all spells
	(all armies)

Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
	(all armies)

skillTree.name: Seize the Astral Gate
skillTree.description: Pure Chaos energy washes over the opposers of the Great Plan. Their understanding of the power of magic will soon be put to the test.

effects.description:
Strips enemies of any magic resistance they may have!
	(local enemy armies)

skillTree.name: Control of the Tempest
skillTree.description: With every spell cast, the arcane squall grows more belligerent.

skillTree.name: Indomitable Spirit
skillTree.description: Death did not stop Kroak.

ui_effects.description: âž• Restores 4 Hit Points per second
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Directive of Hastening
skillTree.description: By Kroak's will the Lizardmen march to war.

skillTree.name: Directive of Battle
skillTree.description: The winds stir as the Lizardmen charge.

skillTree.name: Directive of Order
skillTree.description: The line must be held.

skillTree.name: Enlightenment of Potec
skillTree.description: The enlightenment of Potec grants Lord Kroak unparalleled insight into the serenity in all things, even how to predict and control the ebbs of time itself.

skillTree.name: Directive of Slaying
skillTree.description: Interlopers will be slain.

skillTree.name: Directive of Defense
skillTree.description: Skill and awakened instinct.

skillTree.name: Directive of Endurance
skillTree.description: For the long struggle ahead.

skillTree.name: Vicious Telekinetics
skillTree.description: Only the foolish would stand before Kroak's might.

skillTree.name: Ancient Resilience
skillTree.description: The embodiment of pure will.

skillTree.name: Geomantic Protection
skillTree.description: With a surge of power, the discordant are thrown back and the upholders of order are granted protection.

effects.description: Ability: "Supreme Shield of the Old Ones"

unit_ability.description: Supreme Shield of the Old Ones

ui_effects.description: âž• Triggers explosion that knocks back enemies

effects.description: Cooldown: -50% to "Supreme Shield of the Old Ones"

skillTree.name: Astromantic Augury
skillTree.description: Nothing slips past the watchful Slann.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(all characters)

Enemy Hero action success chance: -10%
	(all characters)

skillTree.name: Marked Spawnings
skillTree.description: Blessed and ready for greatness.

effects.description:
Hero and Lord recruit rank: +1
	(all provinces)

Hero and Lord recruit rank: +2
	(all provinces)

skillTree.name: Ultimate Arcana
skillTree.description: Power overwhelming.

effects.description:
Number of uses: +2 for "Bolt of the Old Ones" and "Blessing of the Old Ones"
	(all armies factionwide)

Number of uses: +4 for "Bolt of the Old Ones" and "Blessing of the Old Ones"
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Iron Will
skillTree.description: Able to persist through death, and protect the Lizardmen with his great power.

skillTree.name: Power of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: The Lizardmen strike with impressive ferocity.

effects.description:
Melee and missile weapon damage: +5%
	(all characters)

Melee and missile weapon damage: +10%
	(all characters)

skillTree.name: Blessed Adornments
skillTree.description: Not simply decorative.

skillTree.name: Omnipresence
skillTree.description: Kroak's will touches all Lizardmen.

skillTree.name: Awakenment
skillTree.description: After millenia of hibernation, their minds and bodies finally stir to action.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for all Slann
	(all armies factionwide)

Melee attack: +25 for all Slann
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Supreme Enchantments
skillTree.description: Mundane weaponry will not fell the Slann.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +25% for all Slann
	(all armies factionwide)

Wardsave: +10% for all Slann
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Composed Spirit
skillTree.description: Kroak's presence calms and assuages.

skillTree.name: Geomantic Haste
skillTree.description: Moving through paths unseen by all except the Slann.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +5% for armies
	(all armies)

Campaign movement range: +10% for armies
	(all armies)

skillTree.name: Identification
skillTree.description: No items of power can be allowed to slip into the hands of the opposers of the Great Plan.

skillTree.name: Invigorated Spawning
skillTree.description: The Lizardmen are the world's final hope for the great war to come.

skillTree.name: Stability Field
skillTree.description: The harmful effects of harsh environments are lessened through precise applications of magic.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(all armies)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(all armies)

skillTree.name: Mental Fabrication
skillTree.description: A simple enough task for a Slann.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -5% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(all regions)

	(all regions)

Construction cost: -10% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(all regions)

Construction time: -2 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(all regions)

skillTree.name: Sigils of Teleportation
skillTree.description: Reinforcements must be summoned from the Temple Cities to the front lines.

skillTree.name: Aura of Regeneration
skillTree.description: The warriors' wounds heal quickly with magical and herbal remedies.

skillTree.name: Wards and Evocations
skillTree.description: Kroak was instrumental in the victory of the greatest siege against the forces of Chaos.

effects.description:
Enemy siege holdout time: -1 (minimum 1 turn)
	(all characters)

Enemy siege holdout time: -2 (minimum 1 turn)
	(all characters)

skillTree.name: Secrets of Chaos
skillTree.description: Without the shackles of his mortal form, Kroak has learned much that the Chaos gods have tried to keep hidden.

effects.description: Melee attack: +50 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos and Norsca

Weapon strength: +10% for all units when fighting against Warriors of Chaos and Norsca
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Boost Income
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: All Eyes on Kroak
skillTree.description: The Lizardmen allowed to Kroak to be slain once. It will not happen again.

skillTree.name: Grand Palanquin
skillTree.description: The Saurus who carry Kroakâ€™s Palanquin aloft are sustained by his powerful will.

skillTree.name: Spirit Guardians
skillTree.description: Lord Kroak has many guardians, though not all can be plainly seen.

effects.description:
Ambush defence chance: +25%
	(Heroes in local province)

Ambush defence chance: +50%
	(Heroes in local province)

skillTree.name: Colossal Deliverance
skillTree.description: Mere walls cannot prevent Kroak from reaching his target.

skillTree.name: Trancendental State
skillTree.description: After a great act of power and violence, the ability to quickly return to a state of grace is valuable indeed.

skillTree.name: Ultimate Deliverance
skillTree.description: Nothing shall - or could - stand in Kroak's way. Nothing.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: The Spirit of the Venerable Lord Kroak
backgroundSkills.description: Lord Kroak's power is that of a First Generation Slann, his connection with the Old Ones far greater than any of his living kin.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
